text:
Question 145) A metal alloy comes out of the oven at a temperature of 3 000 ° C and decreases 1% of its temperature every 30 min.
Use 0.477 as approach to log10 (3) and 1.041 as approach to log10 (11).
The time elapsed, in the hour, until the league reaches 30 ° C is closer to
A) 22.
B) 50.
C) 100.
D) 200.
E) 400.
